name: Knightmare (itch) (startmovego)
description:
Knightmare is a roguelite dungeon crawler following the story of a young child who's learning to cope with nightmares. Play as ghostly knights, either as a single player or cooperatively with a friend, and help the child make it back to his bed before he gets overcome with fear. 



This is our first "official" submission (we screwed it up last time🤦‍♂️) to Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2. The theme is: You're not alone.  

Development by: Shane Buchan
Art and Design by: @thenamesnick
Sound Mixing by: Kevin Jones
